essf:StoredFilterDescription.essf:Title: SubscribeForFeatureTypeWithinWiderFlightRouteBuffer
essf:StoredFilterDescription.essf:Abstract: Filter for selecting notifications on a specific feature type occuring within specific buffer around a given flight route. This stored filter accepts the following arguments: 1/ argument 'typename' 2/ argument 'flightroute' 3/ argument 'innerDistance' 3/ argument 'outerDistance'

essf:Parameter.name: typename
essf:Parameter.essf:Abstract: the typename of a feature expressed as a qualified name (e.g. aixm:Runway)

essf:Parameter.name: flightroute
essf:Parameter.essf:Abstract: the flight route provided as the innter xml of a gml:posList element (e.g. '8.0505555555556 52.3716666666667 -87.9044 41.9800'). the SRS for the posList is urn:ogc:def:crs:OGC:1.3:CRS84, thus having a lon lat axis order.

essf:Parameter.name: innerDistance
essf:Parameter.essf:Abstract: the flight route buffer distance provided as value with nautical miles unit.

essf:Parameter.name: outerDistance
essf:Parameter.essf:Abstract: the flight route buffer distance provided as value with nautical miles unit.

essf:StoredFilterDescription.essf:FilterExpressionText: <wsnt:Filter xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"> <wsnt:MessageContent Dialect="http://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xpath-19991116" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:aixm="http://www.aixm.aero/schema/5.1"> //${typename} </wsnt:MessageContent> <wsnt:MessageContent Dialect="http://www.opengis.net/ses/filter/level2"> <fes:And> <fes:Not> <fes:Filter xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/wfs" xmlns:fes="http://www.opengis.net/fes/2.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml/3.2" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:swe="http://www.opengis.net/swe/1.0.1"> <fes:DWithin> <fes:ValueReference>aixm-wfs:extentOf(.)</fes:ValueReference> <gml:GeodesicString> <gml:posList srsDimension="2" srsName="urn:ogc:def:crs:OGC:1.3:CRS84">${flightroute}</gml:posList> </gml:GeodesicString> <fes:Distance uom="[nmi_i]">${innerDistance}</fes:Distance> </fes:DWithin> </fes:Filter> </fes:Not> <fes:Filter xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/wfs" xmlns:fes="http://www.opengis.net/fes/2.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml/3.2" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:swe="http://www.opengis.net/swe/1.0.1"> <fes:DWithin> <fes:ValueReference>aixm-wfs:extentOf(.)</fes:ValueReference> <gml:GeodesicString> <gml:posList srsDimension="2" srsName="urn:ogc:def:crs:OGC:1.3:CRS84">${flightroute}</gml:posList> </gml:GeodesicString> <fes:Distance uom="[nmi_i]">${outerDistance}</fes:Distance> </fes:DWithin> </fes:Filter> </fes:And> </wsnt:MessageContent> </wsnt:Filter>
